title: Sweet Sweet
overview: By the will of fate, a person suffering from aphasia can overcome his disorder only after eating homemade ice cream Tian Tian De. Somehow her ice cream calms him down, allowing him to talk without problems. Sum, greedy for a special ice cream Tian Tian De, even settles in front of the girl's house. As a result, she is forced to cook ice cream for him every day...
